overview:
Holt Lyda is the founder of Lyda Interactive Marketing. Previously he worked as the Senior Art Director of the IDEA Group at Yahoo. While there he starred in the employee video below.

Having left Yahoo in 2003, Holt was immediately hired as a contractor to develop marketing tools for multiple Yahoo products. Of particular importance was the creation of many marketing demos & tours for the Yahoo! Mobile monetization initiative for advertisers. Mr. Lyda is also responsible for the design & art direction of the Yahoo! Careers website (http://careers.yahoo.com). Other Lyda Interactive clients include Zong, Microsoft, EarthLink, CNET.

Holt lives in Atlanta and continues to service clients in the Bay Area.
